ca.ualberta.cs.swapmyride

Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.swapmyride.Trade

  • public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
    Trade is the major object to encapsulate all information about a trade that will occur All relevant information to the trade will be held here. Owner items belong to the current user Borrower items are items that belong to a friend.
    Author:
    adrianomarini on 2015-10-26.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trade(User owner, User borrower)
      Constructs the trade with indication of who the two users participating in the app are.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept()
      Accept allows a trade to be accepted and implements the functionality to send an email with more information to all parties.
      void addBorrowerItem(Vehicle vehicle) 
      void addOwnerItem(Vehicle vehicle) 
      void changeBorrowerVehicle(Vehicle old, Vehicle newOne)
      Functionality to swap out vehicles in a trade if needed
      void changeOwnerVehicle(Vehicle old, Vehicle newOne)
      Functionality to swap out vehicles in a trade if needed
      void decline()
      accept allows a user to decline a trade

      java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> getOwnerItems() 
      java.lang.Boolean getOwnerNotified() 
      Trade makeCounterTrade()
      if a trade is declined, a new trade can be initialized with the same items from both sides pending changes
      void send()
      sends notifications to the borrower and owner, and then adds the trade to the pending trades of each user.
      void setBorrower(User borrower) 
      void setBorrowerItems(java.util.ArrayList<Vehicle> borrowerItems)
